column5: Apply for the part-time course here.Develop your analytical skills and knowledge of the key products, investment strategies and risks present in financial markets.
column7: Our tuition fee for UK students starting full-time study in 2023/24 is £9,910 for the course.  Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
column9: 1 year/15 months full-time, 2 year/30 months part-time
